participant_1.name: Franklin
participant_1.personality: Franklin is a laid-back retiree who enjoys the simple pleasures in life. He has a great sense of humor and loves sharing stories from his past.
participant_1.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.

participant_2.name: Cameron
participant_2.personality: Cameron is a hardworking and dedicated individual, always striving to learn more in his field. He has a nurturing side, especially when it comes to his pets.
participant_2.background: i'm a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. my cats are very special to me.

content.text: do you gamble while there   or is that just part of the job
